thread.section_title: DIY Awards Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DIY Awards | diyawards.com
thread.title: Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text: I have never had a bad experience with DIY Awards. The user interface is easy to use and customer service steps in to assist with suggestions and assistance to get the job completed. Prior to using DIY Awards, I've worked with other vendors and usually had to deal with a long, drawn out, back-and-forth process. DIY Awards has streamlined the process. I don't use any other vendor for awards!
